amendment.description: Amendment makes a corrective change in the text of the resolution.
amendment.purpose: Amendment makes a corrective change in the text of the resolution.

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment (A002) and on the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 235 - 183 (Roll no. 519).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
